extendedInfo.description: Help!! Home Bear is lost and it's up to you to get him back home! Join your new cuddly friend in a brand new adventure just in time for Easter! Help Home Bear through many exciting and colourful lands using a bundle of wacky tools. Fill up on delicious treats in the Land of Chocolate before moving on and finding all the colourful easter eggs in the Easter Egg Hunt.Navigate the glamours fairground complete with colourful attractions, then beat the rising waters and fly through the air in April Showers. Use a selection of cute and vibrant items on Home Bear's journey, items such as the balloon that allows our furry hero to fly high into the sky or the marshmallow that plugs nasty holes in the ground. Bear-tacular fun awaits in this puzzle adventure from Dojit Games, levels of various difficulty cater to all players and playing types with fun and helpful tutorials to help more younger and less experienced players enjoy the game. ----------------------- HOW FUN IS HOME BEAR? LETS LOOK AT THE FACTS: A brand new spring adventure for the easter holidaysAmazing and beautiful visuals Fantastical tools to help our new hero Loveable main character Various degrees of challenge Learn while your play 100% child friendly A sweet and uplifting soundtrack Hours and hours of fun for all ----------------------- Become a fan of Home Bear on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/homebeargame Follow Home Bear on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/homebeargame Repin Home Bear on Pinterest: http://pinterest.com/dojit/home-bear/ Terms of Service : http://www.dojit.com/legal/terms-of-service/ Privacy Policy: http://www.dojit.com/legal/privacy-policy/

reviews.title: Amazing casual game
reviews.comment: Hi,  I really enjoying the game, there are lots of new features. The bear can now doing more things, i love the cute design. Its every time very pleasant to play Home Bear.   I recommend it to all.   Mohamed
reviews.author: Mohamed LAHLALI
